388d74d8-e67f-5fa6-869e-ef4e179b990d.title: Acceptance Criteria - If a binder other than those listed in Table 306.091 is proposed for use, laboratory test results must be produced to show that binder satisfies the required working time and strength determined in accordance with the VicRoads Test Method.

557615b6-66c2-5595-84ca-82dc25232b75.title: In any layer, transverse joints in adjoining paver runs shall be offset by not less than 2 m

920f5e8a-ca55-557c-8a5c-1c802ab5e69a.title: Transverse joints offset from one layer to next by not less than 2 metres

122d823b-9379-5eb2-910a-2671f81abb1f.title: Longitudinal joints to be located within 300mm from planned traffic lane lines or within 300 mm of the centre of a traffic lane.

2ad9465b-bfcb-52e7-a18d-36f222393a0a.title: Working Shall Not be more than specified for each binder: Rapid Setting (GP) - 2hrs (Oct-Apr) 3hrs (May-Sept) Medium Setting (GB) - 3hrs (Oct-Apr) 5hrs (May-Sept) Slow Setting (Slag) - 8hrs (Oct-Apr) 12hrs (May-Sept)

435439f6-7100-5445-891f-2312d8e02e74.title: Acceptance Criteria - Review delivery dockets to ensure all information required as per 306.07 (b) is recorded and meets the specification requirements.

dc053589-c243-53e0-b7b0-18a6cb651731.title: Acceptance Criteria - Except for the purpose of curing, no water shall be added to the cementitious treated material.

d7237664-b0d7-5b9d-9a87-5c8e0e7b4d4b.title: Water shall be clean and substantially free from detrimental impurities such as oils, salts, acids, alkalis and vegetable substances.

eec9ad79-973b-55e1-b732-ea5fc93c6b94.title: Acceptance Criteria - Compaction Scale Required is Scale A.

4e91358e-5e29-51a0-81df-6a2fe6670480.title: Acceptance Criteria - Characteristic Value of MDD to be 96% or greater. Moisture content at the time of spreading and compaction, is within +0.5% and -1.0 % from the Modified optimum moisture content.
